description: Create overlay backgrounds to show pop up content like Modal, Sidepanels.

propList.name: brightness
propList.description: Set the overlay intensity / background color. 0 will be white and 10 will be black

propList.name: active
propList.description: Programatically control the overlay. Determines whether an overlay is open or closed.

propList.name: onStateChanged
propList.description:
Callback fired when an overlay is open/closed.
@param active - The state of the overlay
